mapinfo.detailsText:
Players will battle to control the sea in the Indonesian archipelago. Make use of the catamaran to plan the expansion of your colony on both land and sea. There are no trade routes but Sufi and Jesuits have settled on these islands.
 
 Native Civs: Jesuit / Sufi 
 Mercenaries: Wokou Pirate / Marathan Dacoit 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
mapinfo.loadDetailsText:
Players will battle to control the sea in the Indonesian archipelago. 
 Make use of the catamaran to plan the expansion of your colony on both land and sea. 
 There are no trade routes but Sufi and Jesuits have settled on these islands. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCivs: Jesuit / Sufi
 -Mercenaries: Wokou Pirate / Marathan Dacoit
 
 ---------------------------------
